author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
title: Should you be ordering food from outside?
description: Even though restaurants and food delivery merchants are promising the strictest of safety precautions during this time of crisis, it is natural for people to worry. How much of a risk do deliveries and packages entail?
content: Just recently, a pizza delivery boy in South Delhi was found to be COVID-19 positive. Reports suggest that as many as 72 families from across South Delhi, who received packages from the delivery boy have been asked to practice self-quarantine after the latest… [+4806 chars]
